note:
I'm a fine artist who specializes in wildlife and the natural world. I've been to Mongolia 12 times, Kenya twice & Yellowstone NP. Plus trips to Europe.

I paint in oil & also use gouache & watercolor. I've drawn since I was a kid & still love to do that with pencil, pen & ink. I love using vintage dip pen nibs.

I live in Redwood Country on the north coast of California on a rural acre with my husband, our two "Lassie dogs" Hailey and Peregrin and 17+ yr. old Michiko the cat.
